chunk.textFormat: As the EMS (Engine Management System) is a sensitive part of the engine system integrated with the vehicle electronic system. It is of outmost importance that the connectors and the clamping for the harness are in good condition.

Following service information
Connector
Harness
Clamping

The participants shall check the connectors for the sensor and clamping for the engine harness.
This visual check is important to get the correct value from the sensors to the ECU.
Check for broken harness or missing clamping as well as corrosion on the outside.
Fault that can occur if the harness or connectors do not work properly

Environmental problem
High fuel consumption
Derating
Non-erasable fault codes
